long_description: With a women-specific fit for female runners and walkers, the Sorbothane UltraSole Insoles deliver extra cushioning, strike protection and a profile that encourages proper pronation. Insoles feature a runner's last that properly fits women's running shoes for high-performance support, gait cycle improvement and prevention of over-pronation and fatigue. Relatively wide toe area mimics a woman's more dramatic heel-to-toe ratio. Sorbothane Energy Core(TM) under the forefoot provides maximum energy return for an efficient toe-off. Women-specific fit includes a narrower profile of the heel and midsole, and a deeper heel cup than the men's fit. Polyurethane layer adds structural support and absorbs and dissipates impact. Nonslip, antifungal foam layer cushions and rebounds to original shape; brushed polyester fabric top layer adds comfort and extra moisture wicking. Heel insert absorbs up to 94.7% of impact shock, reducing impact-related injuries, jarring, fatigue and pain, while adding comfort. Overstock.
short_description: With a women-specific fit for female runners and walkers, the Sorbothane UltraSole Insoles deliver extra cushioning, strike protection and a profile that encourages proper pronation.
